setting.title: Member Details
setting.roleDesc: Manager is entitled to invite members and access member settings.
setting.givePlansDesc: A plan needs to be allocated to use the product.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.caution: Please enter 20 characters or less. You can use Korean English special characters (excluding (>), (<)) and spaces.
nickname.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later

password.title: Password
password.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
password.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later

message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated to Workspace members.
message.updateFail: Failed to update member details from the Workspace please try again later.
message.notChangeMasterPlan: Master's plan can only be changed by the master.

setting.nicknameCaution: Please enter 20 characters or less. You can use Korean English special characters (excluding (>), (<)) and spaces.
setting.passwordCaution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

kick.title: Remove member from Workspace
kick.desc: The selected members are removed from your Workspace. They are no longer be able to use Workspace-related products and services. Removed members can be invited again.

message.kickFail: Failed to remove Workspace member please try again later

password.title: Reset Password
password.desc: Resetting the password of selected Workspace account.
password.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

message.fail: Failed to change a password, please try again later.

delete.title: Delete account
delete.desc: Deleting the selected member account. The uploaded data from the deleted account will not be deleted and only account related information will be deleted. Deleted data cannot be recovered.

message.fail: Failed to delete the account, please try again later.

add.title: Add Workspace Members
add.desc: Sending a Workspace member invitation email to the email address you entered. A member is added if this member accepts the invitation. You can allocate plans whenever you prefer from the [member settings].
add.emailDesc: Please enter the VIRNECT member's email address of the person you want to invite and send an invitation. By accepting your invitation the member can become one of your Workspace member and use products together.

message.inviteFail: Failed to invite a member to Workspace please try again later.
message.inviteSuccess: The invitation email has been sent. The member is added when this member accepts your invitation.
message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated when inviting new Workspace members.
message.enoughPlan: No plans available to assign to Workspace members please purchase plans and invite them again.
message.memberOverflow: Please contact us if you would like add more members to the Workspace. Contact
message.workspaceOverflow: In Public Service one user can participate in up to 9 Workspaces. To join the selected Workspace please make yourself available first by leaving one of the Workspace you are in and request an invitation email to the Workspace master member.
message.memberAlready: Cannot invite a member who has already participated in the Workspace.
message.noHavePlans: There are no remaining plans available. Please go to the payment center and purchase the plans.
message.memberWithdrawal: Email accounts with a history of withdrawal cannot be invited.

create.title: Add Workspace member
create.idPlaceholder: Enter the ID of the account to be created.
create.passwordPlaceholder: Please enter your password for the account to be created.
create.workspaceMemberDesc: 멤버 계정을 직접 생성합니다. 등록 계정은 등록된 워크스페이스를 통해 서비스를 이용합니다.
create.workspaceTooltip: 현재 회원 수/워크스페이스 멤버 제한 수

caution.createId:
Enter your ID and password to create a new workspace member account. 
<u>You must allocate at least one plan you have when creating an account.</u>
caution.validUserId: You can choose between 4 and 20 characters of english letters and numbers for the ID
caution.validId: You can choose between 4 and 20 characters of english letters and numbers for the <u>ID</u>.
caution.validPassword:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
caution.canModify: Logged in user can change the password and account details updated during account registration.

message.successContent: The account is created based on the information entered. You may use the service using the created account. Please let the user know of setting up the password recovery question & answer
message.idDuplicated: This ID is already registered, please enter a different ID.
message.notCheckId: 중복 확인을 하지 않은 계정이 있습니다.
message.notHaveAnyPlan: You need to allocate at least one plan to the account you are creating.
message.fail: Failed to add a member, please try again later. If a same problem occurs please contact a network adminitrator.

seat.title: Add Workspace Seat
seat.desc:
시트는 멤버처럼 플랜을 할당해 제품을 이용할 수 있는 임의 멤버입니다.
누구나 시트를 통해 아래 서비스를 이용을 할 수 있습니다.
seat.removeDesc: 오픈룸에 비 로그인 사용자가 참여 링크를 통해 접속합니다. 시트 추가를 위해서는 Remote 플랜이 필요합니다.
seat.viewDesc: 오픈 콘텐츠를 비 로그인 사용자가 다운로드해 체험합니다.
